\n도지 채굴기 위탁관리 계약서\n\n주식회사 니아코퍼레이션 대표이사 윤: DOGE Miner Consignment Management Agreement Representative Director Junghoon Yoon of Nia Corporation (hereinafter referred to as “Party A”) and _____________ (hereinafter referred to as “Party B”) enter into the following DOGE Miner Consignment Management Agreement. Article 1 Purpose This Agreement is for the agreed purpose of using the mining computer owned by Party A.
\n주식회사 니아코퍼레이션 대표이사 윤정훈(이하 “갑이라 함)과 ____: Nia Corporation CEO Jeong-Hoon Yoon (hereinafter referred to as “Party A”) and _____________ (hereinafter referred to as “Party B”) enter into a contract for consignment management of the Doge Mining Machine as follows.
\n제6조 계약의 해지\n1)“을의 단순 변심으로 인한 계약해지는 할 수: Article 6 Termination of Contract 1) The contract cannot be terminated due to a simple change of mind on the part of Party B. 2) If Party A or Party B can no longer achieve the purpose of the contract due to a cause attributable to Party B, Party A may terminate the contract in writing. In this case, it will not have any effect on the legal relationship of the entrusted management already performed, and will extinguish the contractual relationship for the future.
\n제5조 양도금지\n“갑”과 “을”은 이 계약에 따른 권리를 제3자에게: Article 5 Prohibition of Assignment “A” and “B” may not assign or provide collateral for their rights under this Agreement to a third party, and even if they do so in violation of this Agreement, they may not assert such rights against each other.
\n도지 채굴기 위탁관리 계약서\n: Dogeco Mining Machine Consignment Management Agreement

\n제3조 위탁관리료\n1)위탁관리료 430 USDT(테더)이며 계약체결: Article 3 Consignment Management Fee 1) The consignment management fee is 430 USDT (Tether), and the consignment management fee must be paid to “Party A” in advance at the time of signing the contract, and “Party A” will provide “Party B” with (15TH). 2) The Dogecoin mined through the hash purchased by “Party B” will be distributed 85% to “Party B” and 15% to “Party A.” 3) The consignment period is (3 years), and after 3 years, the ownership of the mining cloud server consigned by “Party B” will belong to “Party A.”
\n제4조 관리보고\n1)”갑”은 채굴된 도지코인을 “을”의 전자지갑에: Article 4 Management Report 1) “A” must deposit the mined Dogecoin into “B”’s electronic wallet, and “A” is not responsible for any fluctuations in the price of coins deposited into the electronic wallet. 2) “B” cannot raise any objection to “A” regarding the amount of coins mined through “A”’s entrusted management, including the deposit amount of coins, from the date of depositing the coins into the electronic wallet. This is to prevent “A” from being held responsible for any issues arising during “B’s” personal wallet management process, even if the coins were delivered normally. 3) The amount of coins mined may vary depending on the Dogecoin mining environment.
